"The goal of life is living in agreement with nature."
 
 Zeno, Greek philosopher
 
 
 
 "All speech is vain and empty unless it be accompanied by
 action." 
 
 "Small opportunities are often the beginning of great
 enterprises." 
 
 "You cannot have a proud and chivalrous spirit if your conduct
 is mean and paltry; for whatever a man's actions are, such
 must be his spirit." 
 
 Demosthenes 
 
 
 "I have always thought the actions of men the best interpreters
 of their thoughts." 
 
 John Locke 
 
 
 "Enjoy when you can, and endure when you must." 
 
 "How can you come to know yourself? Never by thinking, always by doing. Try to do your duty, and you'll know right away what
 you amount to." 
 
 "Nothing is worth more than this day." 
 
 "There is nothing worse than aggressive stupidity." 
 
 "Treat a man as he appears to be, and you make him worse. But treat a man as if he were what he potentially could be, and you make him what he should be." 
 
 "Whatever you can do or dream, begin it." 
 
 "Whenever I hear people talking about 'liberal ideas,' I am
 always astounded that men should love to fool themselves
 with empty sounds. An idea should never be liberal; it must be vigorous, positive, and without loose ends so that it may fulfill
 its divine mission and be productive." 
 
 Goethe 
 
 
 "Better fare hard with good men than feast it with bad."
 
 "Such is the irresistible nature of truth that all it asks, and all
 it wants, is the liberty of appearing."
 
 "What we obtain too cheap, we esteem too lightly."
 
 Thomas Paine

"Good quotes. Too bad they are only words."
 
 -Kesseltron
"The meaning of every conversation is contained within the listener."

"The meaning of every conversation is contained within the listener."

 
 A very neat encapsulization of The Critique of Pure Reason.

"I outlived my dick."
 
 Willie Nelson--on his 75th birthday.

"I outlived my dick."
 
 Willie Nelson--on his 75th birthday.

 
 ROTFLMAO!
 
 It's true I'm getting older.
 
 Of that there is no doubt.
 
 What used to be my pride and joy
 
 Is now my water spout!emoticon_smile

"Why are there no hands in my pants?"
 
 "Expectation is greater than application."
 
 "That's not what I meant by hands in my pants."
 
 -Zardoz

"I myself have never been able to find out precisely what feminism is; I only know that people call me a feminist whenever I express sentiments that differentiate me from a doormat or a prostitute."
 - Rebecca West

"I myself have never been able to find out precisely what feminism is; I only know that people call me a feminist whenever I express sentiments that differentiate me from a doormat or a prostitute."
 - Rebecca West
Well, at least you know your place. . . .emoticon_xbouncer 
 
 
 
 Just a joke. . . . . . . emoticon_xbye
Save the whales. Collect the whole set.
